EmailTemplate.subject: Keep full cockpit integration with the DU-875 Display
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell and its business partner, Banyan Air Service, offer the owners of business jets the opportunity to transform the performance, safety, and value of your aircraft with cabin updates.
Tired of seeing flight information on a 25-year CRT screen? Frustrated by failures and exchange costs? Boost your pilot’s vision and add instant value to your aircraft with the update of the Honeywell DU-875 displays.
Unlike many other screens, the DU-875 LCD display units are designed to fit your existing system, reducing downtime and additional costs. The best part? The DU-875 update doesn’t require additional pilot training or cabin modifications.
Update your screen today and get some of the latest security features that come with the DU-875* program:
- 3D terrain, obstacles and runway data - Traffic alert and collision avoidance system - Meteorological Terminal Aviation Routine Weather Reports (METARs) and Terminal Aerodrome Forecasts (TAFs)
Contact Banyan Air Service to get a quote! GET A QUOTE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/replace-your-du-870-with-du-875-receive-benefits]]> *Some features are available only on select platforms.
